text: @ByronYork If Trump hands out masks at his rallies isn't he admitting that Covid-19 isn't a hoax? Isn't he conceding the 'liberal talking point' that Coronavirus is still virulent and dangerous? Isn't Trump and his group of deplorable supporters an absolute embarrassment?
